entry.content:
Description

(Amit Saha) Failure is just a fact of running software in production. But you can prepare for it in a controlled environment using Chaos Engineering techniques. In this talk, you will learn to make use of chaos engineering practices to plan and assess your production readiness. This means that you are more ready for the failure scenarios, when, not if, they happen.
